name: Mask and Seek
description:
Spooktober Jam Submission 

Hide from the seekers and remove all of the clones. 

The goal is to remove all of the clones in the level. You lose the game when you are found by one of the seekers.

Helpful tips:

  • You are less likely to be found when you are masked.
  • Remember that the seekers can move faster than you.
  • Hide behind one of the clones when you are being followed.
  • Use the compass to help you find the clones.
Arrows/WASDMoveLeft ClickMaskRight ClickInteract (Remove Clone)EscapeQuit

Music and art was created by @Odd1Inn
